data.meta_site_name: Larry Barnett Obituary | June 26, 2023 | William L. Danks Funeral Home - Beaver Dam, KY
data.text:
Larry Ray Barnett, 66, of Echols, Kentucky went to see Jesus on Monday, June 26, 2023 with his family by his side at Owensboro Health Regional Hospital. He was born July 2, 1956 in Linton, Indiana to the late Roy Barnett and Betty Vincent Barnett. Larry retired from Armstrong Coal Company and was superintendent for Hartford Rock Quarry. He was a member of Echols Day Star Church of God.

Aside from his parents he was preceded in death by his sister, Rita Cooprider.

He leaves behind to cherish his memory, his loving wife of 33 years, Vicky Barnett of Echols; 4 children, Chris Barnett of Tipton, Indiana, Amanda (Dan) Baumumk of Terre Haute, Indiana, Kelli (Kenny) Bishop of Tipton, Indiana, and Sheena Cook of Morgantown; 2 brothers, Roy (Cindy) Barnett of Columbiana, Ohio and Steven (Angie) Barnett of Linton, Indiana; father and mother-in-law, Hillard and Athelene Farris, brother-in-law, Robbie (Beth) Farris; sister-in-law, Amanda Farris; mother at heart, Betty Shaver; dear friend, Richard Pillow, several nieces and nephews and a host of friends.

A funeral service will be held at 1 PM on Saturday, July 1, 2023 at William L. Danks Funeral Home in Beaver Dam, Kentucky with Rev. Betty Shaver and Rev. Michael Decker officiating. Burial will follow in Echols Cemetery in Echols, Kentucky. Friends may visit with Larryâ€™s family from 10 AM until the time of the service Saturday at the funeral home.

Online condolences may be left for the family of Larry Ray Barnett by visiting his memorial tribute at www.danksfuneralhome.com.
